values:
So 2day i've dun nothin... i woke up round 11:45, watch tv , made pancakes but it didnt rly work. then went on comp 4 a while, then went 2 sunbathe. i've been home alone cuz mums @ work & dads in bucharest. so its been quite nice bein alone. 
I cnt w8 til tmrw cuz i get 2 c my amore yey. he's rly sweet but i'm still gonna be careful cuzi dnt wanna b hurt again , anyways got nothing 2 write so i'll update wen sumthing interesting happens.
http://piccolaizzy.livejournal.com/3782.html

So on saturday woke up bout 12:30 went on comp & had bath while rents went shopping, when they came bk from shopping i got ready & mum & dad took me 2 ale's. Ale was still eating wen i got there & there was also dani, so we talked 4 a while & i told ale about my rly weird dream, then she translated it in2 italian so tht dani cud understand. Then he left around 4:30 i think boh, anyways then we were tlkin 2 miki & other ppl on msn, then i went 2 have a shower cuz we had 2 get ready 2 catch the train @ 6, i had a shower went bk 2 tlk 2 miki & he was makin stupid comments as usual... but hey.... then ale had a shower & wen she finished i went 2 get dressed. We got in2 va @ 6:15 & as we were walkin out of the station i cud here sum1 cllin my name so i lookd round & saw tht it was marco2 who was on the same train tht we were on. then just outside of the station we saw chloe which was nice cuz  i hadnt seen her 4 aaaaaaaaaaaages. she was with a friend & they were waitin 4 sum1 else. When he came we walked up 2 the gogo fruit 2gether & they went 2 eat chinese & we went 2 c james & rachel & other ppl. then ale, me , and rach went 2 do a giro. i was feeling all sbleh cuz of teddy & nothing any1 cud say cheered me up. then we went bk 2 the gogo fruit where we hung around & saw loadsa ppl from the european skwl. A bit later chloe gave ale a squillo so we went 2 look 4 them, wen we saw eachother we sat down with them. Chloe & me had a discussion about a certain pirla (teddy). then i went 2 the toilet & wen i got bk simone & samantha had arrived. i thought simone must know something bout teddy cuz he like kept lookin @ me & lookin away, but i kept feelin rly crappy & evry1 kept tryin 2 make me feel better but it wasnt workin, then later samantha, chloe & simone (the 1 with dreadlocks) all went away. & maddy & ale turned up, then they dissapeared 4 aaaaaaaaaaaaaaages but me , simone & fabio strted tlkin & stuff, then simone went off 2 get food so me & fabio were tlkin & i sfogated myself 2 him which was nice, then 1ale came bk & so did maddy & ale & 1 of the bands played sweet child o' mine & i went absoloutely crazy cuz i love the song i was screaming & shouting every1 was lookin @ me weirdly but oh well capita... then simone came bk & we strted tlkin again the we strted takin random pix like usual which was kwl. then 4 sum reason i dnt know why i've 4gotten i was pretty drunk simone moved 2 sit nxt 2 me, but anyways then i cnt rly remember much. oh w8 i got up & then sat on him & we were tlkin & i knew ale was saying sumthing behind my bk 2 him but i didnt know wat, but then me & simone kissed & he's a rly gr8 kisser hehe. oh yh & b4 we kissed ale (guy) was like sayin tht ther was a pink elephant bhind me & i fell 4 it, i told u i was drunk  but anyways... then me & simone went 2 do a giro & on the way we met sum of his friends & i introduced myself as izzy & they were like izzy? wat kinda name is izzy & i was like my names isobel but i dnt like it so icll myself izzy so boh, then the bottom of my trouses broke which rly sukd & i kept trippin up which rly rly rly sukd but hey... @ least i was with simone.. so then we sat on a bench tlkd snogged tlkd sum more & snoggd sum more, then we went. when we got bk 2 the gogo fruit i went 2 piss then wen i came bk ale was tlkin 2 him but i just ignored it. then i told him 2 come with me & i asked him if he only kissed me just cuz i was sad & he was like definately not so i was happy, then we went bk over 2 ale & mauro, then i was tlkin 2 mauro & friends & simone & ale were tlkin, then simone told me 2 follow him & we kissed & then he was like wat wud u say if i asked u 2 get 2gether with me, i was like yh i wud like 2 but u have 2 promise me not 2 make me suffer & he was like listen i've never made any1 suffer & @ this point ale butted in & sed we had 2 go cuz we were goin piazza montegrappa. ale was like 2 simone if u ever herd her i will kill u so i guess she rly duz care bout me. so anyway wen we got 2 piazza montegrappa we  were listenin 2 music & stuff, then knocking on heavens door came on & i was like la nostra canzone 2 simone & then we strted kissin it was cute. After a while we strted walkin again & they went 2 look @ the moto which i thought were boring so i sad down near casa del disco with simone & ale was standing up, when they had finally stopped lookin @ the moto we went 2 a bar near the yan where ale got an alcoholic drink & simone got acqua frizzante, then me & him kissed & ale was like con passione so boh.. then she was like contro il muro i was like ale. then simone sed 2 me i wish u were invisible woman from the fantastic 4 & i was like y? & he was like so i cud do wat ale sed, i was like ok.... then i had 2 go so i sed bye 2 simone & sed i wud c him on monday. then we had 2 w8 4 a bus & wen we got on it i nearly fainted cuz i was so hot thnk god i got off wen i did. then we went 2 cabiaglio but i was rly tired so mauro took us bk home where i was dead. i was hopin 2 get 2 sleep but i cudnt cuz the birds di merda kept me up so i must've slept bout 20 mins which rly sukd. 
So then on sunday  we had 2 get up 2 go 2 the benvenuto lunch thing. i didnt feel tht bad @ 1st but i soon felt rly shitty & hungover even my mum realised lol. anyways me, ale & rach went in the pool james didnt cuz he was bein boring. but i was tryin 2 get on a stupid plastic whale but i cudnt stupid thing, so then i got out & sunbathed a bit then went inside & me & cathy were bein stupid singing the sound of music songs, then around 5 we left & wen we got bk 2 ale's i crashed on the bed strate away & ale hasd a shower then mauro arrived. i slept 4 like 3 hours & still felt like shit but hey....then we went 2 bed but cnt remember wat time. 
Then on monday we got up like 12:30 i think boh anyways mauro came over & i went 2 have a shower so tht ale & mauro cud b alone 2gether , then went 2 have lunch, then i think around 2:15 mauro went, so me & ale strted getting ready 2 go 2 va cuz i was meeting simone, 4 sum reason i was rly nervous but thts just me, so we arrived in va around 3:15 & went 2 buy cigs then went 2 meet him infront of footlocker, wen we saw eachother we hugged & kissed & ale was like u wud think u havnt seen eachother 4 like 3 weex oh well... so then we sat on a bench near oviesse 4 a while where we showed simone the video's & pix then we went 2 the civico & we ordered beers, then round 5 ish giorgio came so ale & him cud tlk without interrupting me & simone, giorgio kept saying i was arrapata but hey...then nearish 6:15 me, ale & simone strted walkin 2wards mauro's work. then i sed bye 2 simone & we went home & i took a nap b4 dinner, then after dinner we went on msn & simone was on so i tlkd 2 him 4 ages, then mauro came so ale & him went in2 bedroom 4 hours so i was on the comp chattin 2 ppl, wen mauro left i got ready 4 bed & we turned out the light & ale was bein stupid & she was like shall we play uno so we played sum games of uno & then she taught me scopa,then we went 2 bed. 
2day i got up around 12:30 - 45 went on comp had lunch went on comp again & then went shopping 4 stuff we need wen ale's rents r away. then came bk & around 7 mauro turned up but only 4 a bit then mum came 2 pik me up , then came home went on comp, ate & now i'm bk on comp... i'msooooooo happy 2 b with simone he's so sweet 2 me yey..i'm bk 2 my bubbly crazy slef yey...
http://piccolaizzy.livejournal.com/3352.html

So wed i had my last exam so tht means i'm finally on holiday yay! so after exam i came home had something 2 eat & then went 2 varese 2 meet ale. we met some of ale's friends so we hung round wit them 4 a bit then i saw scott, lorenzo, & lorenzo C, they were accompaniating scott sumwhere i think it was 2 scuola guida but not sure anyways wen the 2 lorenzo's came bk we went 2 tlk 2 them & Lorenzo kept punching me & now i've got a massive bruise on my arm but hey capita, then alessandro turned up but i didnt tlk 2 him apart from askin him 4 a cig & sayin bye 2 him. we stayed tlkin & listenin 2 ipods on the bench near casa del disco 4 a bit then scott arrived stressd but then he went again. then we were wlkin 2 the conrad but alessandro & Lorenzo C went 2 a shop, so me , ale & Lorenzo went 2 the conrad, me & ale ordered a corona & Lorenzo a coffee. i payed 4 evry1, then ale & Lorenzo C turned up so yeh.... Lorenzo was prendating me in giro saying i was alredy drunk but hey.... after un po marco covini turned up, ale wanted 2 go 2 the toilet so we went inside but she cudnt go cuz it was broken, so watever, so we went back outsde, @ about 6:15 we went 2 meet mauro who was takin us home. it was so weird seein ale & mauro just as friends i cudnt take it. Oh btw ale's decided not 2 go 2 aberdeen thnk god! so anyway wednesday eve we went 2 the scrunch wiv mauro, gio & fabio. it was k. the funniest part was wen andrea clld & i didnt want 2 tlk 2 her so the 1st time she rung mauro pikd up & sed i think u've got the wrong number, so she sed sry & put the phone down, then the 2nd time she clld gio pikd up & put this rly stupid voice on & she kept sayin stop prendating me in giro & he was like i'm not this is how i speak, then she was like pass me  izzy & he was like wat? & she sed this is my friends phone & he waslike well i stole this phone 2day & she was like u have 2 giv it bk blah blah blah.. so wen they had put the phone down we strted laughin & tlkin bout her, then my phone rang again & i was like she's cllin again, but instead it was my dad, andrea had clld home sayin tht sum1 had stolen my phone she's so fukin naive!!!! wat a sfigata! anyways then she clld again so ale pikd up & was like hellohello but andrea didnt say anything so boh, but then she clld again & was like is Isobel Hanson there & ale was like no she's puking up in the bathroom & andrea was like ok & put the phone down, puttana. vabbe. then we went home & stayd outside con mauro e fabio a bit skerzating, but ale got sad which i don't like. but anyway then we went in the house got ready 4 bed, & clld miki , he was in rome cuz he went 2 c iron maiden, we tlkd 4 a bit then we went 2 bed. 
so on thursday we did fuk all in the day, just lazed around. then in the evening we went 2 the last pub in gavirate with mauro, gio & fabio, it was ok but not brill, @ 1 point ale went 2 tlk 2 mauro in privato & i was tlkin 2 fabio & gio & fabio kinda let it slip bout davide & another girl hu is always @ his house & 4 sum reason it made me rly rly sad & i strted 2 cry, so mayb i still 2 have feelings 4 davide.... i just dunno i'm so fukin confused, & i was hoping teddy wud suddenly show up & we wud tlk & we wud get bk 2gether but of course tht didnt happen i just feel so unloved. i dnt know wat 2 do....... i need some major help.. so anyways on the way home mauro did a discorso con ale which i didnt rly understand which made her rly upset & made her cry which hurt me..... then her & mauro were txtin & stuff. then we went 2 sleep xcept i cudnt get 2 sleep cuz i was thinkin bout teddy & i want 2 know wat i've done i miss him so fukin much it hurts so much tht i dnt know wat 2 do ...
anyways 2day we didnt do anything either but ale decided she  wanted 2 get bk with mauro, so late afternoon he came 2 ale's & they tlkd stuff then they were kissin so i strted doin cazzi miei & thinkin of my probs which made me feel rly shit cuz i was of course thinkin of teddy so i went & lokd myself in  the bathroom 2 think & stuff then wen mauro i came out & huggd ale & just broke down, then me & ale lay on her bed & she made me cheer up abit, then we clld miki & he made me laugh abit so tht was k, then i went home had a bath & then went 2 dinner wit parents which was k, then wen we came back i went online & now i'm tlkin 2 miki, & then i decided 2 cll teddy & i thought he wasnt gonna pik up but he did but he was saying pronto , pronto , chi 6? so it was like he cudnt hear me but i think wen i sed it's izzy he just pretended he cudnt hear me cuz he duznt wanna tlk 2 me, so i put the phone down, tried 2 cll him again he didnt pik up so i left him a voice mail sayin hey it's izzy , i rly rly rly need 2 tlk 2 u because i don't understand y u dumped u ( i rly miss u & need u, plz send me a txt or call me , i need u , plz contact me, bye. i just know he's not gonna contact me but how can he do this 2 me , wat the fuk hav i ever done 2 him, i miss him so fukin much i cant even think bout bein with any1 else cept him.... now i'm rly sad & nothing any1 can say can make me feel better, i cnt take it anymore, evry1 says move on but i cnt. he's probably rly happy with another girl & he's prob alredy 4gotten bout me, it feels like my hearts been smashed in2 a million pieces, i dnt wanna feel like this anymore.
http://piccolaizzy.livejournal.com/3296.html

Well 2day has been crappy like most of my days recently. i got up @ 2:20 & dad wasnt here so went on comp did sum work & chatted with ale & miki, then dad came bk, so i went downstairs & had something 2 eat & watched tv, then came back on comp did more work & chatted more with miki & ale, then ale dropped a bomb & told me she's gonna move 2 aberdeen 2 work & go 2 uni, i mean OMG why? like i seem 2 b losing evrything l8ly i.e teddy & now ale, i mean i always thought i'd have ale & it doesnt mean tht our frendship will die cuz i know it wont but it wont be the same, aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaargh im so fukin frustrated lately fuk the world. vita di merda!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! ke pallle. i mean hu else do i have? like no1!!! Fuk FUk fuk fuk fuk thts how i feel. well @ least ale can make me laugh. 
well anyways then i went 2 watch tv & miki clld me & was prendating me in giro saying tht i'm a fighetta & he sed tht i'm not allowed 2 cry blah blah blah...so @ least he made me laugh a bit. it hasnt rly hit me tht ale's leaving but im still shokd. 
i pikd up the phone, dialled teddy's number let it ring twice & then hung up cuz i cudnt do it, even tho i rly need 2 & wanna tlk 2 him 2 sort things out, i miss him so fukin much............................................................................ i love him 4 fux sake, surely if u love sum1 u shud b with them? oh i dunno. it's a fukd up world. but i knew tht this world wasnt perfect so it shudntb surprisin tht sumthing like this was gonna happen. but of course i've been stuk in my world where clouds r pink & made of candyfloss. well @ least i know tht freddy (my doggy) won't abandon me. hopefully.  "i can't get no satisfaction". anyways nothin 2 say cept la vita e 1 merda!
http://piccolaizzy.livejournal.com/2846.html

So woke up @ 2:15 2day, watched tv & ate something, then came on2 comp & checkd emails & horoscope.. then strted studyin 4 bio seein as i hav my stupid exam on wed, but @ least its the last exam & then im free, but i'm not rly lookin 4ward 2 the holidays cuz i was gonna spend them with teddy but ovviamente now i'm not gonna 2 which is rly sucky & upsetting 4 me. i want him back, i've never felt this way b4, i didnt even feel like this wen i was with davide. love supposed 2 b a happy feelin but because we're not actually 2gether it rly hurts, i want him back & i will do anything 2 b with him, but he doesnt want me back but i cant understand i wish he would xplain 2 me. i want 2 help him, i dnt even think of any1 else, even if a hot guy walks past me i don't go crazy, whats wrong with me????? i never used 2 b like this, even after davide dumped me, sure i was  upset but nothing like this......
i cnt w8 til wed after my exam cuz @ least thts 1 less thing 2 stress about & then i can get my social probs sorted out, (i hope). 
God i'm so down, not even ale can make me laugh which is amazing. Recently i've been pretending that i'm felice even when i'm not, but i cant keep on pretending. Fuck i dnt know wat 2 fukin do!!!!!!!!!!!!!! i'm so frustrated, angry, depressed. i just dnt know wat 2 do. FUK!
http://piccolaizzy.livejournal.com/2564.html

Well friday night i went out with parents & the berries 4 chinese meal which was nice & then me, kyle & gaz went in 2 va where we met Lucas, Lucas vollmer, stephen , kristof, Laura, michele & some other ppl which i cant remember, anyways got kinda drunk but it was fun, got home around 3 & went 2 bed cuz the nxt day i had 2 meet giuse @ 2:15 in va. saturday i woke up @ 1:15 & had 2 rush but i managed 2 get 2 va on time. so i met up with giuse & we stayed around til 6:10 when we took the bus bk 2 cab. we stayed @ his drinkin, tlkin & watching tv (mostly the simpsons). i was pretty drunk but so was giuse. so it was quite funny. @ around 12:30 ish i think it was, luca & martina turned up cuz they had been @ a matrimonio. luca was pretty outta it, but he was tllin me tht i was an ubriacona so watever. we stayed up tlkin with them 4 a bit, then we all went 2 bed but i dunno wat time it was, me & giuse watched scary movie. but i was so outta it i cnt remember it much. wen it had finished we cuddled & fell asleep like tht. 2day we didnt get up til 3, well actually i got up @ 3 cuz i needed 2 piss & i wanted a cig , giuse got up bout 3:15. then we just slumped on the poltrona all day. lol. watching tv & cuddling. then i left @ about 7:15 & it was fukin pissin with rain, so i had 2 walk from giuses 2 sotto la chiesa & i got drenched, it was not nice. on the way home we were followin samu & babi but they didnt see me, as soon as i got home i changed , then had dinner & then had a bath. 
although i had fun this weekend i couldnt stop thinking about teddy, & i've realised tht i rly love him & tht he's the only guy i want, & i will wait 4 him however long it takes i've never felt like this not even with davide. thers sumthing bout teddy but i just dnt understand, he's not answerin any of my calls or txts i feel like shit. i miss him so much. Fuck y's life so fuckin shit. i dnt ask 4 much i just want teddy, if i have teddy i wont need anything else. he cnt understand how much he's makin me suffer & he sed he didnt ever wanna make me suffer. but mayb giuses right, maybe everything he ever told me were stronzate & me being naive fell 4 them. i soooooooooooooooooo hope he comes back 2 me, i would do anything 4 tht 2 happen, i dnt care if ppl think tht thts stupid i'm going 2 do it.  i just want 2 go bk 2 the fun izzy, i dnt want 2 be the depressed cappy izzy anymore. i'm goin crazy, i am tryin 2 b happy but it just duznt work. @ least i have friends who try 2 tirarmi su. i just wanna tlk 2 him again, surely i deserve an xplanation....
2 top it off i'm rly hungover & feel like shit so yeh....
http://piccolaizzy.livejournal.com/2473.html

yey only 1 more exam 2 do then its the hols, i cant fukin w8, i mean i dunno wat i'll b doin 4 the summer but @ least i dnt hav 2 fukin stuyd 4 fukin stupid exams. sp 2day had my history exam which wen ok, then i came home & since then i've dun fuk all & im rly kinda bored thers nothin 2 do, i cnt fukin w8 2 get my patente after my bdau im gonna strt goin 2 the driving skwl so @ least thts sumthing i can look 4ward 2. god wen i get my patent i can go anywhere wenever i fukin want finally....
spoke 2 jenna 2day & she sed she might b comin over nxt mnth i rly rly rly hope she duz cuz i miss her, it wud b so nice if she came, we havnt seen eachother in over a yr which rly rly rly sux. gave teddy a squillo 2day i dnt think tht was a very gd idea but hey its dun now, he didnt reply but i wasnt xpectin him 2. i rly hope he's ok . maybe he is just makin xcuses boh....i rly need 2 know. but i'm gonna w8 4 him i dnt care how long it takes i kno sum ppl (Ale) will think im bein stupid but oh well. 
ke palle ale's gon 2 the heineken jamming festival lucky bitch. i just hope her & mauro dnt have a fight cuz they might kill eachother which wont b a gd thing. 
guys r so fukin complicated & then they complain tht we r, @ least we show our true feelings & say things we think, guys either get all moody & dnt say anything or use violence. grrr i might become a lesbian but with exceptions lol. well g2g now food. bk ok so dad just strted askin me bout teddy like r u goin 2 c him where is he blah blah blah, i havnt told my rents tht i'm not with him anymore oh well , @ least i got his shoelace hehe i'd much rather have him tho...... :(. god life sux. oh well gonna try make my life better by getting drunk & high just kiddin, boh i dunno how i'll make it better but i will, & wen i found out how evry1 will know.
http://piccolaizzy.livejournal.com/2282.html

so 2day i havnt done anything apart from watch tv & study history seeing as my exams tmrw, i'm feeling ok but i'm worried about teddy, i hope he's ok & i just wish he would talk 2 me but he doesnt want 2 so i wont stress him. anyways @ home alone cuz mums @ work & dads gone sumwhere so boh, theres nothing 2 do & im rly fukin bored! i cnt w8 4 the wknd,. i wish it was summer & i wish it was nice weather this weather is soooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo fukin shit. woke up @ 1:30 pm 2day cuz i cudnt get 2 sleep last night so i stayed up til 3:30am watching big brother. che palle i cant b bovverd 2 go 2 skwl tmrw. i need some excitement in my life, fukin hell. i dnt think this summer will b a gr8 1, @ least i'm going 2 england 4 a week 2 get away from all the fukin stress!!!!!! well nothin 2 write so yeh bye..
P.S my sis is soooooooooooooooooooooo fukin lucky it's her bday 2day & she's in cuba with her bf i wish i was her.
http://piccolaizzy.livejournal.com/2023.html

I'm a little bit better 2day thn yest but stil quite upset & confused.. anyways havnt dun anything 2day, got up @ 2pm watched tv been on computer & eaten thts about it rly. i feel so shitty, i miss him but  i know he doesnt want me but i'll wait 4 him maybe it's stupid but thts wat i wanna do. i'm angry @ myself tht i let this happen, i shudnt have got with him so quickly i shud have got 2 know him b4 & w8ed a while b4 getting with him.... fuk i've messed things up, he's never gonna wanna go out with me again i just know it....... i don't even know wats happened he wont answer my mex's....i sent him a mex sayin tht i'd leave him in peace & sorry if i've been annoyin its just tht i care, i need u. but i wont call again. the good thing  is tht i havnt cried 2day nearly but i havnt so @ least tht shows tht im getting bit better, dnt no wat 2 say so gonna go now. izzy
http://piccolaizzy.livejournal.com/1764.html

so 2day i've had my ups & downs mostly downs but hey... anyway went 2 skwl this morning 2 do my maths exam, it was ok hopefully i'll pass but hey it dnt matter if i dnt.  got home & had lunch, after i went on computer 4 a bit didnt tlk 2 any1 much, i felt shitty so i tried callin teddy but he wasnt pikin up, so then i decided 2 send him a mex sayin stuff like just tell me if u dnt want 2 b with me anymire, i dnt wanna feel like this cuz i'm hurting. u promised me u'd never hurt me but u r @ this moment, how could u tell me tht u love me & then just ignore me. i love & care bout u & if somethings happend plz tell me, natuarally i didnt get a reply bk from him & i'm not expectin 1. i just dnt fukin understand wats going on & ... well i just got a mex from him & he broke up with me. & i feel like complete shit
http://piccolaizzy.livejournal.com/1507.html

Well this whole week has been pretty shitty but yesterday i think must have been the crappest day, i thought i was meeting teddy but when i called him he didn't answer so i rly dunno what tht's about, i really need2 tlk 2 him & get things cleared up because i do not want 2 b fucked around with again. i'll be sad if we br8k up but i'm suffering more now cuz i really need him right now & he doesnt seem 2 give a fuck. so that was 1 of the things then i had a fight with ale the 1st 1 ever since we've known eachother & it was over a cazzata but cuz i was stressd & so was she, we just kinda blew up, but we made pace so tht was gdgd. in the eveinin we went 2 cabiaglio & tht brought back loadsa memories with davide so i wasn't so happy but hey... me & ale got home about 3:30 but we werent tired so we decided 2 call miki which was quite fun, we were on the phone 4 about 1 hour & a half so it was getting light when we finally went 2 bed lol. 
2day we got up bout 1:15 & had lunch, then went online 2 speak 2 miki 4 a bit. mauro came around 3 & not long after that my mum came & i went home. when i got home i went online & spoke 2 miki, i started sfogating myself & strted crying. then dad got pissed so i went up 2 my room & just cried on my bed 4 ages, then i strted throwing things around, it made me feel a little bit better but not much. i then went 2 watch tv, & miki called me so we tlkd 4 a while, which was nice. i just feel like shit theres nothing any1 can do 2 make me feel any better, the only person that can make me feel better is teddy but he doesnt seem 2 want 2 b part of my life anymore which rly rly rly sux. i just feel like getting away from everything & every1 i need my fuckin space but no1 seems 2 understand that, but i rly do appreciate ppl tryin 2 help me, but its not working & i feel so fucking ungreatful. i dont rly know wat 2 say just tht maybe i should give up on everything & evry1.
http://piccolaizzy.livejournal.com/1068.html

Hey, i'm feeling rly pretty depressd 2day which rly rly rly sux. My exams r strtin tmrw but funnily enought thats not y i'm depressd, i'm depressd cuz of my bf, i havnt been in contact with him & his phone is off. if he duznt want 2 go out with me any more why duznt he just tll me, he's makin me suffer & he promised me tht he'd never make me suffer, but i guess u can never blieve wat ppl say. write in ya soon. luv izzy
http://piccolaizzy.livejournal.com/989.html

Um well this is my 1st entry. i'm feeling kinda crappy @ the moment, 1st of all cuz i went out last night & drank 2 much and 2nd cuz i miss my boy but he's not cagating me, i'm trying not 2 think about it but it's rly hard...
I had a gr8 time with ale last night thnk u!!!!! i'm dreading monday cuz my exams strt & my 1st exam is maths which i know i'll fail, the 2nd 1 is italian & tht shud b ok.. dunno wat 2 write so write in ya soon. bye. luv izzyxxx
http://piccolaizzy.livejournal.com/560.html
